explains: n. 阻挠，妨碍；堵塞；障碍物；阻塞，梗阻；（体育项目中的）阻挡犯规
wordGroup: obstruction of justice 妨碍司法公正；阻碍司法

sentences.en: The boy was suffering from a bowel obstruction.
sentences.cn: 那男孩当时在受肠梗阻之苦。

sentences.en: He had an operation to remove an obstruction in his throat.
sentences.cn: 他做了手术，取出喉头的阻塞物。

sentences.en: John was irritated by drivers parking near his house and causing an obstruction.
sentences.cn: 约翰被众司机在他房子附近停车而造成阻塞所激怒。
